title: How to Establish a Forward Base in TF2 As an Engineer

steps.headline: Learn how to be an engineer.
steps.description: A better engineer equals a better team.

steps.headline: Before leaving respawn, place a teleporter entrance, and restock your metal.
Find a secluded corner near the front lines, but far enough back to avoid immediate attack.
Build a dispenser in the corner, or behind you.
steps.description: This way, you will not have to leave to get more metal.

steps.headline: Your next priority should be to build a sentry.
Try to get your sentry up to level three as fast as possible, as a level 3 is far more difficult to defeat than a level 1.
Your next priority is to build a teleporter exit, on your side, facing away from you.
steps.description: At this point, you should have plenty of cover, have a sentry in front of you, a dispenser behind you, and an exit next to you. From this point, you can easily repair all elements of your forward base.

text: Learn how to be an engineer. A better engineer equals a better team. Before leaving respawn, place a teleporter entrance, and restock your metal.  Find a secluded corner near the front lines, but far enough back to avoid immediate attack.  Build a dispenser in the corner, or behind you. This way, you will not have to leave to get more metal. Your next priority should be to build a sentry.  Try to get your sentry up to level three as fast as possible, as a level 3 is far more difficult to defeat than a level 1.  Your next priority is to build a teleporter exit, on your side, facing away from you. At this point, you should have plenty of cover, have a sentry in front of you, a dispenser behind you, and an exit next to you. From this point, you can easily repair all elements of your forward base.
